revised_title: Removing Infinite Self-Energies of Point-Particles in Physics
tldr: The authors present a method to modify the energy-momentum tensor to remove infinite self-energies of point-particles without affecting the equations of motion. They demonstrate this method for electromagnetic and meson fields, showing that the modified tensor leads to a finite integral of energy and momentum over any space-like surface. This approach helps avoid spurious infinities and provides a finite total energy and momentum.
